content:
PropertyMetadata Class

In this Article

Represents the behavior of a dependency property.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public class PropertyMetadata

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • PropertyMetadata

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Constructors summary

PropertyMetadata()

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class.
PropertyMetadata(Attribute[])

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with an array of attributes.
PropertyMetadata(Object)

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value.
PropertyMetadata(DependencyPropertyOptions)

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value.
PropertyMetadata(Object,Attribute[])

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value and an array of attributes.
PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions)

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value and a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value.
PropertyMetadata(DependencyPropertyOptions,Attribute[])

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value and an array of attributes.
PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions,Attribute[])

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value, a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value, and an array of attributes.
PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions,GetValueOverride,SetValueOverride)

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value, a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value, and delegates to override the GetValue and SetValue logic associated with the dependency property.
PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions,GetValueOverride,SetValueOverride,Attribute[])

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value, a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value, delegates to override the GetValue and SetValue logic associated with the dependency property, and an array of attributes.

Properties summary

DefaultValue

Gets or sets the default value of the associated dependency property.
GetValueOverride

Gets or sets the GetValueOverride callback, a callback invoked immediately upon a call to the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue* method.
IsMetaProperty

Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options* is set to DependencyPropertyOptions.
IsNonSerialized

Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options* is set to DependencyPropertyOptions.
IsReadOnly

Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options* are set to DependencyPropertyOptions.
IsSealed

Gets a value that indicates whether the PropertyMetadata has been applied to a property resulting in the immutable state.
Options

Gets or set the property which represents the option setting for the DependencyProperty associated to this PropertyMetadata.
SetValueOverride

Gets or sets the SetValueOverride callback, a callback invoked immediately upon a call to the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue* method.

Methods summary

GetAttributes()

Retrieves an array that contains all attributes.
GetAttributes(Type)

Receives an array of type Attribute that contains those attributes having type equal to attributeType.
OnApply(DependencyProperty,Type)

Provides processing when this PropertyMetadata is applied to a dependency property.

Constructors

  • PropertyMetadata()

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class.

    public PropertyMetadata ();
  • PropertyMetadata(Attribute[])

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with an array of attributes.

    public PropertyMetadata (Attribute[] attributes);

    Parameters

    • attributes
      Attribute[]

      Attributes applicable to the dependency property, such as DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute and ValidationOptionAttribute.

  • PropertyMetadata(Object)

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value.

    public PropertyMetadata (object defaultValue);

    Parameters

    • defaultValue
      System.Object

      The object representing the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue* of this PropertyMetadata.

  • PropertyMetadata(DependencyPropertyOptions)

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value.

    public PropertyMetadata (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions options);

    Parameters

    • options
      DependencyPropertyOptions

      The DependencyPropertyOptions used to define the associated dependency property.

  • PropertyMetadata(Object,Attribute[])

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value and an array of attributes.

    public PropertyMetadata (object defaultValue, Attribute[] attributes);

    Parameters

    • defaultValue
      System.Object

      The object that represents the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue* of this PropertyMetadata.

    • attributes
      Attribute[]

      Attributes applicable to the dependency property, such as DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute and ValidationOptionAttribute.

  • PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions)

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value and a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value.

    public PropertyMetadata (object defaultValue, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions options);

    Parameters

    • defaultValue
      System.Object

      The object representing the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue* of this PropertyMetadata.

    • options
      DependencyPropertyOptions

      The DependencyPropertyOptions used to define the associated dependency property.

  • PropertyMetadata(DependencyPropertyOptions,Attribute[])

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value and an array of attributes.

    public PropertyMetadata (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions options, Attribute[] attributes);

    Parameters

    • options
      DependencyPropertyOptions

      The DependencyPropertyOptions used to define the associated dependency property.

    • attributes
      Attribute[]

      Attributes applicable to the dependency property, such as DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute and ValidationOptionAttribute.

  • PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions,Attribute[])

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value, a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value, and an array of attributes.

    public PropertyMetadata (object defaultValue, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions options, Attribute[] attributes);

    Parameters

    • defaultValue
      System.Object

      The object that represents the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue* of this PropertyMetadata.

    • options
      DependencyPropertyOptions

      The DependencyPropertyOptions used to define the associated dependency property.

    • attributes
      Attribute[]

      Attributes applicable to the dependency property, such as DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute and ValidationOptionAttribute.

  • PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions,GetValueOverride,SetValueOverride)

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value, a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value, and delegates to override the GetValue and SetValue logic associated with the dependency property.

    public PropertyMetadata (object defaultValue, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions options, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.GetValueOverride getValueOverride, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SetValueOverride setValueOverride);

    Parameters

    • defaultValue
      System.Object

      The object that represents the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue* of this PropertyMetadata.

    • options
      DependencyPropertyOptions

      The DependencyPropertyOptions used to define the associated dependency property.

    • getValueOverride
      GetValueOverride

      The GetValueOverride delegate that belongs to this instance.

    • setValueOverride
      SetValueOverride

      The SetValueOverride delegate that belongs to this instance.

  • PropertyMetadata(Object,DependencyPropertyOptions,GetValueOverride,SetValueOverride,Attribute[])

    Initializes a new instance of the PropertyMetadata class with a default property value, a DependencyPropertyOptions enumeration value, delegates to override the GetValue and SetValue logic associated with the dependency property, and an array of attributes.

    public PropertyMetadata (object defaultValue, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions options, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.GetValueOverride getValueOverride, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SetValueOverride setValueOverride, Attribute[] attributes);

    Parameters

    • defaultValue
      System.Object

      The object that represents the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue* of this PropertyMetadata.

    • options
      DependencyPropertyOptions

      The DependencyPropertyOptions used to define the associated dependency property.

    • getValueOverride
      GetValueOverride

      The GetValueOverride delegate that belongs to this instance.

    • setValueOverride
      SetValueOverride

      The SetValueOverride delegate that belongs to this instance.

    • attributes
      Attribute[]

      Attributes applicable to the dependency property, such as DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute and ValidationOptionAttribute.

Properties

  • DefaultValue

    Gets or sets the default value of the associated dependency property.

    public object DefaultValue { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • System.Object

      An object representing the default value for this PropertyMetadata.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      Attempting to set this property when stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed* is true.

    Remarks

    This property can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

  • GetValueOverride

    Gets or sets the GetValueOverride callback, a callback invoked immediately upon a call to the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue* method.

    public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.GetValueOverride GetValueOverride { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • GetValueOverride

      The GetValueOverride callback, a callback invoked immediately upon a call to the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue* method.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      Attempting to set this property when stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed* is true.

  • IsMetaProperty

    Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options* is set to DependencyPropertyOptions.

    public bool IsMetaProperty { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if this option is set to DependencyPropertyOptions; otherwise, false.

  • IsNonSerialized

    Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options* is set to DependencyPropertyOptions.

    public bool IsNonSerialized { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if set to DependencyPropertyOptions; otherwise, false.

  • IsReadOnly

    Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options* are set to DependencyPropertyOptions.

    public bool IsReadOnly { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if set to DependencyPropertyOptions; otherwise, false.

  • IsSealed

    Gets a value that indicates whether the PropertyMetadata has been applied to a property resulting in the immutable state.

    protected bool IsSealed { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the PropertyMetadata is immutable; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    When the PropertyMetadata.IsSealed is equal to true, the following operations cause a InvalidOperationException to be raised:

    • Attempting to set the DefaultValue.

    • Attempting to set the Options.

    • Attempting to set the SetValueOverride.

    • Attempting to set the GetValueOverride.

  • Options

    Gets or set the property which represents the option setting for the DependencyProperty associated to this PropertyMetadata.

    public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions Options { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyOptions

      The option setting for the DependencyProperty associated to this PropertyMetadata.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      Attempting to set this property when stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed* is true.

    Remarks

    The possible values for this property are:

    DependencyPropertyOptions DependencyPropertyOptions DependencyPropertyOptions DependencyPropertyOptions DependencyPropertyOptions
  • SetValueOverride

    Gets or sets the SetValueOverride callback, a callback invoked immediately upon a call to the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue* method.

    public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SetValueOverride SetValueOverride { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SetValueOverride

      The SetValueOverride callback, a callback invoked immediately upon a call to the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue* method.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      Trying to set this property when stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed* is true.

Methods

  • GetAttributes()

    Retrieves an array that contains all attributes.

    public Attribute[] GetAttributes ();

    Returns

    • Attribute[]

      An array that contains all attributes.

  • GetAttributes(Type)

    Receives an array of type Attribute that contains those attributes having type equal to attributeType.

    public Attribute[] GetAttributes (Type attributeType);

    Parameters

    • attributeType
      Type

      The Type of attributes to return.

    Returns

    • Attribute[]

      An array of type Attribute that contains those attributes having type equal to attributeType.

  • OnApply(DependencyProperty,Type)

    Provides processing when this PropertyMetadata is applied to a dependency property.

    protected virtual void OnApply (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty dependencyProperty, Type targetType);

    Parameters

    • dependencyProperty
      DependencyProperty

      The DependencyProperty to which this PropertyMetadata has been applied.

    • targetType
      Type

      The Type associated with this metadata if this instance is type-specific metadata. If this is default metadata, this value is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

    Remarks

    Sends notification that this metadata has been applied to a property, and the metadata is being sealed. This routine is no-op in this implementation.
